system.sustained:
Power lasts for Psy Rating Rounds, whilst active the Psyker can perform the Charmer's Gaze Reaction. As a Half Action they can prematurely end this power to immediately end any Grapples, Crippling Effects, and Fires they were suffering and make a Half Move as a Free Action which does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.
Charmer's Gaze (Reaction, Attack): Used in response to being targeted by a Ranged or Melee Attack, after the attack has been resolved the Psyker makes +0 Willpower Test. If successful they stun the target until the end of their next turn. Target must have line of sight and the ability to see the Psyker (EG: if target is blind or firing indirectly, this effect does nothing).
